newsitem.title: FINLAND: HELSINKI ENDS DOWN, OFF LOWS DUE US UPTURN ON DATA.
newsitem.headline: HELSINKI ENDS DOWN, OFF LOWS DUE US UPTURN ON DATA.

text.p: * Shares end broadly down but off early lows on Wednesday as
U.S. Treasuries gain on July PPI, retail sales data and U.S.
stocks open up. Nokia ends down at 465.00 or two markka below
* Merita up, taking its cue from positive overseas trends,
having traded flat for most of session after its H1 earnings
beat forecasts. Enso down after in-line H1. Eyes on UPM H1
Thursday 0500 GMT, U.S. July CPI Thursday 1230 GMT, brokers say.
